details.publicNotes: These majestic dragons embody the stellar forces that underly and balance all that exists in the universe. Cosmic dragons are wise, social, and patient beings, accepting of all whom they come across; they see all creatures as equal components of the universe and are just as likely to be found discussing astrophysics in the company of scholars as they are to be found lamenting the twists and turns of fate in the company of the downtrodden. Most cosmic dragons can change their shape, though they usually only do so to make other creatures comfortable. They detest deception and always introduce themselves as dragons even while in another form.

items.name: +2 status to all saves vs. divine

description.value: 60 feet. All allied creatures in the aura gain a +5-foot status bonus to Speeds (if the dragon is photon-attuned), or all enemies take a â€“5-foot status penalty to Speeds (if the dragon is graviton-attuned).
You send the creature a mental message of 25 words or fewer, and it can respond immediately with its own message of 25 words or fewer.

Trigger A creature within range enters an environment that would be harmful to it.

A shimmering bubble envelops the target's body, allowing it to breathe normally in a vacuum or other unsafe environment and protecting it from severe temperatures and radiation.

Heightened (7th) You can target up to 5 additional creatures to gain protection against the environment the triggering creature entered. The spell lasts for 8 hours and also protects against extreme temperatures and radiation.

Heightened (10th) You can target up to 10 additional creatures to gain protection against the environment the triggering creature entered. The spell lasts until your next daily preparations and also protects against incredible temperatures and radiation.

The target can understand all words regardless of language and also speak the languages of other creatures. When in a mixed group of creatures, each time the target speaks, it can choose a creature and speak in a language that creature understands, even if the target doesn't know what language that is.

Heightened (7th) The duration is 8 hours.

The cosmic dragon is always attuned to an underlying stellar force: either photons or gravitons. They can swap attunement as a free action once at the start of their turn in combat and is otherwise attuned to whichever force they choose at any time outside of combat. The dragon's melee Strikes deal an additional @Damage[2d6[fire]] damage while they're photon-attuned and an additional @Damage[1d6[bludgeoning]] damage plus Knockdown while they're graviton-attuned. The damage of their cosmic blast Strike is likewise determined by their current attunement, as are the effects of some of their other abilities. The dragon can choose to exclude any creatures from any effect of the aura or action that uses the aura.

The dragon can always sense the distance and direction to the nearest Drift beacon and to the Starstone on Absalom Station.
TThe dragon makes two claw Strikes and one tail Strike in any order.
The dragon recharges their Stellar Breath whenever they score a critical hit with a Strike.

The dragon unleashes divine power like that from the core of a star or black hole, dealing @Damage[13d10[spirit]|options:area-damage] damage in a @Template[type:cone|distance:50] (@Check[will|dc:41|basic] save). The dragon can't use Stellar Breath for [[/gmr 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

The dragon conjures a mote of stellar energy that shares their current attunement. They direct the mote to a square within 90 feet. While the mote is deployed, the dragon's attunement aura also emanates from that square, with the same emanation radius. The dragon can Sustain to move the mote up to 90 feet or to recall the mote from any distance. The mote is made of cosmic energy, doesn't occupy a space, and can't be targeted or destroyed by any effect.

The dragon imposes an effect on creatures within their attunement aura. The dragon can choose either option for each creature, regardless of their current attunement. The dragon can't use Stellar Pulse again for [[/gmr 1d4 #Recharge Stellar Pulse]]{1d4 rounds}.

  • Graviton Each creature must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:41] save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} for 1 round.

  • Photon Each creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} and can use the extra action only to Stride or Strike.

A globe of freezing darkness explodes in the area, dealing 8d10 cold damage to creatures in the area, plus an additional 8d4 void damage to living creatures. Each creature in the area must attempt a Reflex save.

If the globe overlaps with an area of magical light or affects a creature affected by magical light, eclipse burst attempts to counteract the light effect.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} by the darkness for an unlimited duration.

Heightened (+1) The cold damage increases by 1d10 and the void damage against the living increases by 1d4.

A powerful globe of searing sunlight explodes in the area, dealing 8d10 fire damage to all creatures in the area, plus an additional @Damage[(@item.level+1)d10[vitality]] damage to undead creatures. Each creature in the area must attempt a Reflex save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage.

Critical Failure The creature takes full damage and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} permanently.

If the globe overlaps with an area of magical darkness, sunburst attempts to counteract the darkness effect.

Heightened (+1) The fire damage increases by 1d10, and the vitality damage against undead increases by 1d10.

You reach into the void and call down a vertical column of dangerous cosmic material that rains destruction upon creatures in the area and shrouds the terrain around it in a swirl of stardust. This matter is made up of bits of burning stars and chunks of frozen comets, and it deals 5d12 cold damage and 5d12 fire damage to every creature in the area when you Cast the Spell. For the spell's duration, the cosmic material reduces visibility and mobility, making the area greater difficult terrain and making everything seen within or through the area @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed}.

Heightened (10th) The cold and fire damage each increase by 2d12.
